Title: Family at War
Plot: When Stan gets caught in the crossfire between Yvonne and her kids, a full-blown row puts their relationship on the rocks.  Things go from bad to worse when Yvonne finds herself held at gunpoint in the shop.  Stan comes to the rescue but any hopes of this leading to an easy reconciliation are thwarted when the gun goes off and Stan lies bleeding amongst the cut-price yoghurts.
